details.desc: Rain, Lasswell, and Fina as they speed by on chocobos. A new journey dances in each of their hearts as they soar like the wind across the wide, open fields.
details.info: Rain, Lasswell, and Fina as they speed by on chocobos. A new journey dances in each of their hearts as they soar like the wind across the wide, open fields.

details.desc: Rain and Lasswell as they attack enemies aboard an airship. These knights were confused by the onslaught of small monsters who should fear airships, with no way to know that this was the mere beginning of a battle with the world's survival hanging in the balance.
details.info: Rain and Lasswell as they attack enemies aboard an airship. These knights were confused by the onslaught of small monsters who should fear airships, with no way to know that this was the mere beginning of a battle with the world's survival hanging in the balance.

details.desc: Water priestess, Luka, as she purifies the waters of Lake Dorr, and the water god Leviathan, who watches over her. The water god seems to be consoling Luka, who may require years upon years to fulfill her duty of purifying the lake alone.
details.info: Water priestess, Luka, as she purifies the waters of Lake Dorr, and the water god Leviathan, who watches over her. The water god seems to be consoling Luka, who may require years upon years to fulfill her duty of purifying the lake alone.

details.desc: Rain and Lasswell at the Earth Shrine as they confront a mysterious armor-clad intruder. The intruder unleashed a powerful attack at the duo, who warned him against coming near the Earth Crystal.
details.info: Rain and Lasswell at the Earth Shrine as they confront a mysterious armor-clad intruder. The intruder unleashed a powerful attack at the duo, who warned him against coming near the Earth Crystal.

100000501.name: In Order to Change the World

details.desc: Rain, overwhelmed with sadness in the ruined town of Sacher. Due to the royal blood within his veins, he lost the girl who saved his life, resolving himself to change the world. Wielding a cruel blade, he joins the Orders in hopes of becoming the next emperor.
details.info: Rain, overwhelmed with sadness in the ruined town of Sacher. Due to the royal blood within his veins, he lost the girl who saved his life, resolving himself to change the world. Wielding a cruel blade, he joins the Orders in hopes of becoming the next emperor.
details.shop: In Order to Change the World

details.desc: Realizing that Lasswell is struggling with his own feelings interfering with the fulfillment of his duties as king, Akstar challenges him to a sparring session. Determined to steer him in the right direction, Akstar bestows upon him a new skill of his own creation—the guiding mirror of equity.
details.info: Realizing that Lasswell is struggling with his own feelings interfering with the fulfillment of his duties as king, Akstar challenges him to a sparring session. details.desc: Sol, in his attempt to destroy all of Lapis using the Chaotic Darkness. His name, which means sun, was given to him by a friend many long years ago.
details.info: Sol, in his attempt to destroy all of Lapis using the Chaotic Darkness. His name, which means sun, was given to him by a friend many long years ago.

details.desc: A scene depicting Shinju atop Est the coeurl as they carry out a surprise attack on an Aldore military base. They run circles around the soldiers guarding the area, toying with them like balls of yarn. Meow, meow!
details.info: A scene depicting Shinju atop Est the coeurl as they carry out a surprise attack on an Aldore military base. They run circles around the soldiers guarding the area, toying with them like balls of yarn. Meow, meow!

100000901.name: A Day in the Life of Physalis

details.desc: Physalis, living in Grandshelt with Fina. Each day is full of smiles and laughter for the boisterous bunch.
details.info: Physalis, living in Grandshelt with Fina. Each day is full of smiles and laughter for the boisterous bunch.
details.shop: A Day in the Life of Physalis

details.desc: A scene depicting Folka and Citra enjoying a luxurious vacation at the beach. Leaving their weapons aside, they are set on making the best out of their summer, even if this particular moment of peace and calm turns out to be brief.
details.info: A scene depicting Folka and Citra enjoying a luxurious vacation at the beach. Leaving their weapons aside, they are set on making the best out of their summer, even if this particular moment of peace and calm turns out to be brief.

100001101.name: Madam and the Giant Bird, Bennu

details.desc: Madam Edel, squaring off against the giant bird Bennu within some ancient ruins. The atmosphere is tense as treasure seeker and treasure protector face each other.
details.info: Madam Edel, squaring off against the giant bird Bennu within some ancient ruins. The atmosphere is tense as treasure seeker and treasure protector face each other.
details.shop: Madam and the Giant Bird, Bennu

100001301.name: アルティマニア1周年記念

details.desc: 魔道図書館で召喚を行うサクラと、それを見守るアヤカ。他に類を見ないサクラの魔法に、ミシディアの魔道士たちも大喜び。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！
details.shop: アルティマニア1周年記念

details.desc: The members of Morze's Soiree, all gathered together. Though they each spend their free time as they please, with but a single word from Madam, they transform into faithful subordinates ready to venture into the most treacherous of locales.
details.info: The members of Morze's Soiree, all gathered together. Though they each spend their free time as they please, with but a single word from Madam, they transform into faithful subordinates ready to venture into the most treacherous of locales.

details.desc: Fina and Daisy playing at the beach. Enjoying themselves amidst the sand and sea allows them to forget the hardship of battle. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.
details.info: Fina and Daisy playing at the beach. Enjoying themselves amidst the sand and sea allows them to forget the hardship of battle. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.

details.desc: With Aldore and Hess at war, Raegen and Rowen face each other on the battlefield. Raegen proposes to seal Rowen, as one of Hess's Eight Sages, within a crystal in order to bring an end to the conflict. Trusting his friend, Rowen places the future in Raegen's hands.
details.info: With Aldore and Hess at war, Raegen and Rowen face each other on the battlefield. Raegen proposes to seal Rowen, as one of Hess's Eight Sages, within a crystal in order to bring an end to the conflict. Trusting his friend, Rowen places the future in Raegen's hands.

details.desc: Rain and Fina have gathered to celebrate FFBE's 5th anniversary in Grandshelt! Together with their friends, they march in single file toward their destination, proudly holding a celebratory banner emblazoned with the number 5. They're almost at the venue!
details.info: Rain and Fina have gathered to celebrate FFBE's 5th anniversary in Grandshelt! Together with their friends, they march in single file toward their destination, proudly holding a celebratory banner emblazoned with the number 5. They're almost at the venue!

details.desc: Lasswell and Raegen have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. Father and son are hard at work making flags with Citra as fireworks light up the sky above. They're pouring their hearts into every single stitch.
details.info: Lasswell and Raegen have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. Father and son are hard at work making flags with Citra as fireworks light up the sky above. They're pouring their hearts into every single stitch.

details.desc: Charlotte and Physalis have gathered in Grandshelt's central plaza. At Charlotte's command, Physalis shoots the gift box the two brought with them, sending splendid decorations flying out. Thanks for everything!
details.info: Charlotte and Physalis have gathered in Grandshelt's central plaza. At Charlotte's command, Physalis shoots the gift box the two brought with them, sending splendid decorations flying out. Thanks for everything!

details.desc: Dark Fina and Sol have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. While Lid and Jake are busy decorating the roofs of the slums, Dark Fina and Sol blow up balloons below them with a young girl. These balloons are infused with a special magic, so they won't pop even after the festivities are over!
details.info: Dark Fina and Sol have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. While Lid and Jake are busy decorating the roofs of the slums, Dark Fina and Sol blow up balloons below them with a young girl. These balloons are infused with a special magic, so they won't pop even after the festivities are over!

details.desc: Akstar and Cleome have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. In front of the brilliantly decorated Colosseum, Cleome ties an adorable bow on a present with Rinora's help. The bow's every loop and knot is imbued with the special bond shared by teacher and student!
details.info: Akstar and Cleome have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. In front of the brilliantly decorated Colosseum, Cleome ties an adorable bow on a present with Rinora's help. The bow's every loop and knot is imbued with the special bond shared by teacher and student!

details.desc: Lasswell, receiving Purple Lightning from Raegen in his youth. The blade was a perfect fit for a boy who refused to give up on his dream of growing stronger than anyone else, regardless of what natural talent might dictate. The young boy soon came to treasure it as a symbol of the bonds he shares with his father and his dear friend.
details.info: Lasswell, receiving Purple Lightning from Raegen in his youth. details.desc: Rain and the others have come leaping out of the crystals to ring in the New Year with everyone! Here's to another amazing year!
details.info: Rain and the others have come leaping out of the crystals to ring in the New Year with everyone! Here's to another amazing year!

details.desc: Rizer fights against enemy forces to defend his homeland. He bravely leads his army into the battle for control of the crystals and wields his blade to protect his beloved Grandshelt. It is this unwavering love for his country that serves as Rizer's true weapon.
details.info: Rizer fights against enemy forces to defend his homeland. He bravely leads his army into the battle for control of the crystals and wields his blade to protect his beloved Grandshelt. It is this unwavering love for his country that serves as Rizer's true weapon.

details.desc: Mazurka approaches Fina and Daisy, suggesting that they all get along. She hopes to someday get close enough that the three of them can even talk about their crushes together.
details.info: Mazurka approaches Fina and Daisy, suggesting that they all get along. She hopes to someday get close enough that the three of them can even talk about their crushes together.

details.desc: Melo faces enemies to protect his allies. Instead of calling it a pain and running away, he uses his full power to make a clean sweep of the monsters.
details.info: Melo faces enemies to protect his allies. Instead of calling it a pain and running away, he uses his full power to make a clean sweep of the monsters.

details.desc: Duke faces the dragon that was released from the seal. He joins forces with trustworthy friends from his home village, and they manage to safely reseal the dragon. In its place, they find the spear said to have been wielded by Ryunan, the first dragon sealer.
details.info: Duke faces the dragon that was released from the seal. He joins forces with trustworthy friends from his home village, and they manage to safely reseal the dragon. In its place, they find the spear said to have been wielded by Ryunan, the first dragon sealer.

details.desc: Ruggles carves a message to his friend on the stone monument in front of the tree of purification. Time passes, and the adventurer Helena and the mercenary Camille come to visit this same place.
details.info: Ruggles carves a message to his friend on the stone monument in front of the tree of purification. Time passes, and the adventurer Helena and the mercenary Camille come to visit this same place.

details.desc: The skilled gunsmith Macmedi and his grandchild, Lotti, who helps around the shop. Macmedi is an eccentric man of few words, but there's no doubt he cherishes his life with Lotti, his only surviving family.
details.info: The skilled gunsmith Macmedi and his grandchild, Lotti, who helps around the shop. Macmedi is an eccentric man of few words, but there's no doubt he cherishes his life with Lotti, his only surviving family.

details.desc: Chorale confesses his feelings to Nerine. As memories of their past together come flooding back, the ever-faithful steward reaffirms that the woman before him is the one he has always loved. Blessed by their two young onlookers, the two share a tender embrace.
details.info: Chorale confesses his feelings to Nerine. As memories of their past together come flooding back, the ever-faithful steward reaffirms that the woman before him is the one he has always loved. Blessed by their two young onlookers, the two share a tender embrace.

details.desc: Amid her pursuit to avenge her father's death at the hands of Majora, Tomoe faces Gravey, a member of her nemesis's inner circle. Having lost against Gravey once, Tomoe casts aside her doubts and defeats him as part of her mission to restore the Asura clan's honor as its next head.
details.info: Amid her pursuit to avenge her father's death at the hands of Majora, Tomoe faces Gravey, a member of her nemesis's inner circle. Having lost against Gravey once, Tomoe casts aside her doubts and defeats him as part of her mission to restore the Asura clan's honor as its next head.

details.desc: Being discovered as a spy, Domino makes her escape, accompanied by Shatal. As they mow down the approaching wolves, the two push ever further into the desert sands.
details.info: Being discovered as a spy, Domino makes her escape, accompanied by Shatal. As they mow down the approaching wolves, the two push ever further into the desert sands.

details.desc: Charlotte and the knights of Grandshelt head for a decisive battle against Lazarov, but they are not alone. By virtue of their fellowship with Rain and Lasswell, allies from all corners of the land have gathered in furtherance of Charlotte and the knights' endeavors, to fight together in their hour of need.
details.info: Charlotte and the knights of Grandshelt head for a decisive battle against Lazarov, but they are not alone. details.desc: Nichol gazes out from inside a mysterious bubble together with Elle and Luka. Perhaps the three siblings saw a similar sight once upon a time.
details.info: Nichol gazes out from inside a mysterious bubble together with Elle and Luka. Perhaps the three siblings saw a similar sight once upon a time.

details.desc: Krowa mourns the suffering he caused during his time in the Orders. After he encounters the automaton Regina within ancient ruins, their journey together begins.
details.info: Krowa mourns the suffering he caused during his time in the Orders. After he encounters the automaton Regina within ancient ruins, their journey together begins.

details.desc: The mage apprentice Magna and his companion Leopold, who seeks a way to return to his original human form, dash through the forest to escape the elf Forelsket, a wandering chef searching for ingredients.
details.info: The mage apprentice Magna and his companion Leopold, who seeks a way to return to his original human form, dash through the forest to escape the elf Forelsket, a wandering chef searching for ingredients.

details.desc: Zeno of the Beta Star, who appeared before Rain after the crushing loss of his friends. Reaching across time itself, the two work towards their deepest wish, a goal they hold in common: to defeat Emperor Vlad.
details.info: Zeno of the Beta Star, who appeared before Rain after the crushing loss of his friends. Reaching across time itself, the two work towards their deepest wish, a goal they hold in common: to defeat Emperor Vlad.

details.desc: Humanoid robot Elnath joins Ein and Ein's daughter Alde as they play by the river, keeping watch over them. This brief moment of calm spent with his "family" remains with him as a truly fond memory.
details.info: Humanoid robot Elnath joins Ein and Ein's daughter Alde as they play by the river, keeping watch over them. This brief moment of calm spent with his "family" remains with him as a truly fond memory.

details.desc: Sakura and Nichol appear before a group of criminals. In preparation to make their capture, the duo make a splendid transformation into their Orders outfits.
details.info: Sakura and Nichol appear before a group of criminals. In preparation to make their capture, the duo make a splendid transformation into their Orders outfits.

details.desc: Roca was a baby that suddenly appeared in front of Fina. Her companions always watched over her as she matured at a remarkable speed during their journey throughout the Farplane.
details.info: Roca was a baby that suddenly appeared in front of Fina. Her companions always watched over her as she matured at a remarkable speed during their journey throughout the Farplane.

details.desc: Physalis enjoying her vacation with Moog. Swapping rifle for water gun, she fully intends to make the most of her summer. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace she may someday find.
details.info: Physalis enjoying her vacation with Moog. Swapping rifle for water gun, she fully intends to make the most of her summer. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace she may someday find.

details.desc: Taivas and his partner Runda proceed onward in the name of their mission, but not before annihilating the enemy soldiers they encounter en route with overwhelming force.
details.info: Taivas and his partner Runda proceed onward in the name of their mission, but not before annihilating the enemy soldiers they encounter en route with overwhelming force.

details.desc: Tulien gallantly rescues two youths from an Omega spawn, only to be narrowly bested by Taivas, who was in hot pursuit of the girl. Will the day of Tulien's ascension as a true hero ever come?
details.info: Tulien gallantly rescues two youths from an Omega spawn, only to be narrowly bested by Taivas, who was in hot pursuit of the girl. Will the day of Tulien's ascension as a true hero ever come?

details.desc: Taivas has succeeded in rescuing Lehftia, brandishing his blade like a demon to do so. During a moment of respite, he tells the grateful girl of the past which has long haunted him.
details.info: Taivas has succeeded in rescuing Lehftia, brandishing his blade like a demon to do so. During a moment of respite, he tells the grateful girl of the past which has long haunted him.

details.desc: Haveh and Lehftia share their first meeting in the forest, and Lehftia somberly buries a young chick. As the girl sheds tears for a short life now extinguished, Haveh finds himself captivated.
details.info: Haveh and Lehftia share their first meeting in the forest, and Lehftia somberly buries a young chick. As the girl sheds tears for a short life now extinguished, Haveh finds himself captivated.

details.desc: Bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's, the mysterious aggressor from the inauguration ceremony launches his attack against Visectrum.
details.info: Bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's, the mysterious aggressor from the inauguration ceremony launches his attack against Visectrum.

details.desc: Raegen awaits his inaugural speech together with the Sworn Six. His comrades offer him words of support as he takes his first steps as representative of a reborn Paladia.
details.info: Raegen awaits his inaugural speech together with the Sworn Six. His comrades offer him words of support as he takes his first steps as representative of a reborn Paladia.

details.desc: Naming himself Emperor, a man bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's arrives with a fury on Raegen's inauguration day. His intentions remain unclear as the battle for the fate of Paladia begins...
details.info: Naming himself Emperor, a man bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's arrives with a fury on Raegen's inauguration day. His intentions remain unclear as the battle for the fate of Paladia begins...

details.desc: Fina prays for a miracle to aid Rain and Lasswell as they endure a grueling battle. Her hopes resonate with the crystals of the earth, and a blinding light envelops the battlefield before taking on a familiar form...
details.info: Fina prays for a miracle to aid Rain and Lasswell as they endure a grueling battle. Her hopes resonate with the crystals of the earth, and a blinding light envelops the battlefield before taking on a familiar form...

details.desc: Presidential aides are responsible for all manner of tasks. While assignments such as regulating the political itinerary and gathering intel are vital services, image management is also of the utmost importance. In order for the new president to gain the people's trust and adoration, Nichol and Sakura take ample time to coordinate Raegen's attire.

details.desc: Through Fina's prayers, countless hopes were called forth from Paladia itself, merging the souls of Rain and Lasswell and creating a warrior of unsurpassed might. The final clash with Dark Rain, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance, is about to begin!
details.info: Through Fina's prayers, countless hopes were called forth from Paladia itself, merging the souls of Rain and Lasswell and creating a warrior of unsurpassed might. The final clash with Dark Rain, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance, is about to begin!

details.desc: Yshe's would-be sparring partner, Taivas, is at the tavern once more, languishing neck-deep in a bottle. Even so, Yshe holds faith that the man she once knew will return, that the two might settle their score.
details.info: Yshe's would-be sparring partner, Taivas, is at the tavern once more, languishing neck-deep in a bottle. Even so, Yshe holds faith that the man she once knew will return, that the two might settle their score.

100005701.name: In the Name of Yshe's Elites

details.desc: Despite their clashing personalities and fundamentally different fighting styles, Kall and Ilmatalle share a deep respect for Commander Yshe and pride for the unit she leads. The two of them can always be counted on to execute their mission in the name of Yshe's Elites; indeed, they display exemplary cooperation in felling this particular foe.

details.shop: In the Name of Yshe's Elites

details.desc: Charlotte, Friese, and Shepard prepare to deliver presents to the town's children. Their lips turn up into smiles as they imagine the faces of the children receiving their presents.
details.info: Charlotte, Friese, and Shepard prepare to deliver presents to the town's children. Their lips turn up into smiles as they imagine the faces of the children receiving their presents.

details.desc: 一面の雪景色となった大地で戯れるドミノとシャタル。雪明りが照らす中、シャタルはドミノのために特大の雪だるまを作る。戦友のはしゃぐ姿を眺めながら、ドミノは特別な時間を心の底から楽しむのだった。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: In one particular world, there exists a tradition wherein participants show off their talents at feasts for special occasions. To the delight of the guests, Rain's and Lasswell's visions decide to cross swords for their performance, putting on a bold show in the process.
details.info: In one particular world, there exists a tradition wherein participants show off their talents at feasts for special occasions. To the delight of the guests, Rain's and Lasswell's visions decide to cross swords for their performance, putting on a bold show in the process.

details.desc: A vision of Dark Fina dressed in a glamorous kimono and holding a snake. In some worlds, snakes are revered as messengers of divine beings. However, even this noble, holy serpent seems to open its heart to her.
details.info: A vision of Dark Fina dressed in a glamorous kimono and holding a snake. In some worlds, snakes are revered as messengers of divine beings. However, even this noble, holy serpent seems to open its heart to her.

details.desc: Upon their visit to the Six Realms, Dark Fina, King Mog, and their entourage are beset by a monster of massive might and measurements. Though the group is forced into an uphill battle, in response to the prayers of the rookie moogle, visions of Poppy and Lehftia appear to lend their aid!
details.info: Upon their visit to the Six Realms, Dark Fina, King Mog, and their entourage are beset by a monster of massive might and measurements. Though the group is forced into an uphill battle, in response to the prayers of the rookie moogle, visions of Poppy and Lehftia appear to lend their aid!

details.desc: The trump card of Caledfwlch's Unit 1, the Wygars—mechanical armor powered by the mark of transcendence. Their strength is immense and is said to easily crush destructive Omega spawn.
details.info: The trump card of Caledfwlch's Unit 1, the Wygars—mechanical armor powered by the mark of transcendence. Their strength is immense and is said to easily crush destructive Omega spawn.

details.desc: Rain comes face to face with Vanharma at the destroyed base. The young man strikes with all his might, but to no avail, as Vanharma parries and offers a crushing counterattack. Such was the explosive first meeting between these two men, each emboldened by resolute convictions.
details.info: Rain comes face to face with Vanharma at the destroyed base. The young man strikes with all his might, but to no avail, as Vanharma parries and offers a crushing counterattack. Such was the explosive first meeting between these two men, each emboldened by resolute convictions.

details.desc: Having conquered the urge to destroy, Taivas and Yshe face Omega with new blades in hand. The legendary technique Omnibus described in Snovlinka's legend is once again given life by Elmont's mightiest warriors!
details.info: Having conquered the urge to destroy, Taivas and Yshe face Omega with new blades in hand. The legendary technique Omnibus described in Snovlinka's legend is once again given life by Elmont's mightiest warriors!

details.desc: Fina and Runda, enjoying a dip under the sea. Light gently filters down to an underwater forest of coral as diverse schools of colorful fish welcome their terrestrial visitors. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.
details.info: Fina and Runda, enjoying a dip under the sea. Light gently filters down to an underwater forest of coral as diverse schools of colorful fish welcome their terrestrial visitors. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.

details.desc: Mid, freshly spat up by a malboro, approaches the defeated Yego. The dragoon extends a hand to her former ally and rival, and proclaims, "You can't erase the loneliness of your past, but you can heal from it." Touched by Mid and Cid's words, Yego decides to join them, having finally found a (non-malboro) family of her own.

Touched by Mid and Cid's words, Yego decides to join them, having finally found a (non-malboro) family of her own.

100007001.name: The Hour of My Vengeance Is at Hand!

details.desc: As Dioxus confronts Raegen at long last, the Darklord's armor transforms as though feeding on his fury. Thus clad in baleful might, he unleashes the weight of seven hundred years.
details.info: As Dioxus confronts Raegen at long last, the Darklord's armor transforms as though feeding on his fury. Thus clad in baleful might, he unleashes the weight of seven hundred years.
details.shop: The Hour of My Vengeance Is at Hand!

details.desc: Invited to test a new magitek weapon, Roca gleefully hops into her prototype armor to engage Lasswell, Fina, and Raegen—wielding new weapons of their own—in a no-holds-barred (mock) battle.
details.info: Invited to test a new magitek weapon, Roca gleefully hops into her prototype armor to engage Lasswell, Fina, and Raegen—wielding new weapons of their own—in a no-holds-barred (mock) battle.

details.desc: In the hands of Paladia's defenders gleam an array of new magitek weapons developed by Nichol and Sakura to protect the land's peace and peoples. The warriors stand tall, ready to fell the vengeful warrior who would dare threaten their home!
details.info: In the hands of Paladia's defenders gleam an array of new magitek weapons developed by Nichol and Sakura to protect the land's peace and peoples. The warriors stand tall, ready to fell the vengeful warrior who would dare threaten their home!

details.desc: The Sworn Eight, standing strong with Dioxus to commandeer Aldore Tower. Though robbed of their will by Dioxus's Miasma, they still possess their fearsome and unrivaled strength. With its heroes turned against the land they swore to protect, Paladia now finds itself in a crisis of unprecedented magnitude.
details.info: The Sworn Eight, standing strong with Dioxus to commandeer Aldore Tower. Though robbed of their will by Dioxus's Miasma, they still possess their fearsome and unrivaled strength. With its heroes turned against the land they swore to protect, Paladia now finds itself in a crisis of unprecedented magnitude.

details.desc: Rain, having received power from Raegen's armor, catalyzes it into a new form. The red aura that swirls around him dissipates the Miasma in his wake, and with a decisive blow, Rain delivers the rampaging Dioxus his end, finishing their mortal struggle at last.
details.info: Rain, having received power from Raegen's armor, catalyzes it into a new form. The red aura that swirls around him dissipates the Miasma in his wake, and with a decisive blow, Rain delivers the rampaging Dioxus his end, finishing their mortal struggle at last.

details.desc: Fina and the others, having raced up Aldore Tower armed with magitek weapons, corner Dioxus at last. But just as the end seems in sight, Dioxus's armor begins to go berserk, tapping into a hidden wellspring of power. Yet our heroes remain undaunted, and step forward to battle their foe and safeguard the world.
details.info: Fina and the others, having raced up Aldore Tower armed with magitek weapons, corner Dioxus at last. But just as the end seems in sight, Dioxus's armor begins to go berserk, tapping into a hidden wellspring of power. Yet our heroes remain undaunted, and step forward to battle their foe and safeguard the world.

details.desc: When a foe thought slain seven centuries past rises again to seek revenge, Raegen finds himself forced to cross blades with visions of the original Sworn Eight. This ancient enemy, the antecedent Darklord who was forgotten in the whispers of history, now moves to cast his pall of vengeance over all of Paladia.
details.info: When a foe thought slain seven centuries past rises again to seek revenge, Raegen finds himself forced to cross blades with visions of the original Sworn Eight. This ancient enemy, the antecedent Darklord who was forgotten in the whispers of history, now moves to cast his pall of vengeance over all of Paladia.

100007801.name: To Bring an End to This War

details.desc: As Veritas of the Dark, Raegen readies himself before the Giant of Babel, controlled by Sol. These two men, whose fates are bound by the Heart of Babel, have long been at odds—since even before the current conflict. Now stout resolve steels Raegen's blades as he fights to end this tragic war that has been dominated by visionary magic weapons.

details.desc: A scene depicting Snow absorbing Chaos. Partially transforming into a Cie'th, Snow intends to prevent the spread of a Chaos infusion. Burdened by the great regret of failing to protect his lover, he asks the savior to end his suffering as he becomes more monster than man.

details.desc: Tsarevna Alena faces off against a gang of abominable showmen in the Endor Colosseum. Alena never backs down from a fight, even when facing a crew of dastardly doppelgangers. Loyal retainers Kiryl and Borya cross their fingers for luck as they watch the proceedings.
